General.Name: British Automotive Holding S.A.
General.Description: British Automotive Holding S.A., through its subsidiaries, imports, wholesales, and retails cars, spare parts, and accessories in Poland. It offers cars of various brands, including Jaguar, Land Rover, and Aston Martin, as well as SsangYong. The company also provides maintenance and repair services. In addition, it engages in accounting and bookkeeping activities. The company was formerly known as Marvipol S.A. and changed its name to British Automotive Holding S.A. in December 2017. British Automotive Holding S.A. was founded in 1996 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.
